Share passion with your partner

Interests is a large part of what makes life worth living! If you don't share your passion at all with each other, you're going to miss out!

It’s just so awesome to bask in the glow of someone who is passionate about something – even if the subject matter isn’t interesting to you.

This makes it easier to have conversations together, I especially passionate conversations.

Mieke has few interests, What can Mieke and I care about together?
